title: How to consult a counselor or psychologist from home - Quora

response.answer_text: Send them an email, call them, text them, or write them a letter and ask to setup a consult. Don’t forget to leave your phone number and email. Consulting a therapist is the same as consulting a real estate broker, lawyer, doctor or carpenter from home. You get in contact with them and ask. Currently many therapists are only working remotely, so it may be the way you’ll get therapy sessions……from your home, either by video or phone.

You can reach out to any online psychological forum online. You will get an opportunity to chat with them, talk on call or attend video calls. The days annu professionals are working from home itself. So you can simply reach out. You will be directed rightly.

With the outbreak of COVID-19, Govt. of India has legalized Telemedicine and Teleconsultations. You can download Mfine App and create your account. login and consult Psychologists of your choice, from home. FYI Mfine is an AI-powered healthcare platform that connects patients with doctors from branded hospital chains on instant chat or video consultation. It also has tie-ups with hospitals in the cities across India to provide accessible and reliable medical care.
there are many counselor or psychologist available online you can just google and find out about them, book an video consultant appointment and can have a session.

Just give them a call and let them know you’d like to do a remote appointment with them. While many therapists have been very reluctant to do remote therapy, the pandemic has changed that. Most therapists now must use remote technology to provide their services. I hope this helps.
